name: Guitar Hero: Metallica
description:
Guitar Hero: Metallica is an arcade game developed by Neversoft Entertainment and Budcat Creations. It was originally released in 2009. Activision Blizzard published the game. On review aggregator Metacritic, Guitar Hero: Metallica has a score of 85. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play Guitar Hero: Metallica on PlayStation 2, Xbox 360, Wii and PlayStation 3. The game is sold via Nintendo eShop.
